resources.string: "In this game, your plane continuously moves downward while automatically shooting. Control the plane's up movements by tapping the left side of the screen.You can shoot by the right sid e of the screen. Your objective is to survive as long as possible, shooting down enem y targets that appear on the right side. Earn points by destroying enemies . The game f eatures an endless mode with increasing difficulty. Compete for high scores and enjoy the fas t-paced action!"
